attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I WOULD LIKE TO SEE TUESDAY 11TH NOVEMBER 2008, BEING THE 90TH ANNIVERSARY OF WORLD WAR ONE,  BEING DECLARED A PUBLIC HOLIDAY SO ALL REMEMBRANCE SERVICES CAN BE HELD ON THAT DAY.  I WOULD ALSO LIKE IT KEPT IN PERPETUITY.

rejection.details: Your title should be a call for action, not a name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
